joinspy: Diagnostic Tools for Data Frame Joins

Source: R/joinspy-package.R
joinspy-package.Rd

Provides diagnostic tools for understanding and debugging data frame joins. Analyzes key columns before joining to detect duplicates, mismatches, encoding issues, and other common problems. Explains unexpected row count changes and provides safe join wrappers with cardinality enforcement.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://gillescolling.com/joinspy/

  • https://github.com/gcol33/joinspy

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/gcol33/joinspy/issues
